data.text: @scorpiontwit 2/2 meals or a fee for a particular way of booking – and the conditions that apply. We clearly disclose the booking and service fee and the total that customers pay is shown before they finalise their purchase. Please see here for other payment options: https://t.co/C8PFNGA8Oo -H

@scorpiontwit 1/2 Hi Nilesh. Sorry to hear that you're unhappy with our booking and service fee. As a ‘Low Fares’ carrier we offer customers a seat to a destination at the lowest price. For all bookings we also provide an option of additional extras that can be added, whether that’s baggage,

@mantoshb Hi Mantosh, sorry to hear for any difficulty in adding your meal to your booking. If you could DM us your booking reference, full name, and flight details so we can look into this for you. Regards - Lee
@Suzanity8 We’re as excited as you are! See you on board soon – Justine
@Kelzbellz_1 Hi Kelly. I’ve responded to your previous tweet on Jetstar Airways. Thanks - Lee
@Deffal_AG Hi Deffal, thanks for getting in touch. So we can check this for your, could you DM us your full name along with the email that you used on the booking? Thanks-Jerry
@MunyaSiggs26 2/2 We are also working with our ground handler BAGS and our local security company to ensure the security of our customers’ property onboard our flights.  -J

@MunyaSiggs26 1/2 Thanks for bringing this to our attention, as we are taking this matter very seriously. Since the day of this incident we have been investigating and working with Airports of Thailand (AOT) and they have successfully arrested the offender.

@rickyyean Thanks for replying, Ricky and I’m sorry to hear about this. You may want to follow the advice to you earlier to see if web check-in page will work. Also, please check this link for further information about web check-in https://t.co/oIE6a03Hym. Thanks - Josh

@rickyyean Hi. I'm sorry if you have difficulty in doing web check in. We don't have any reported error. You may reload the page by clicking the refresh button. Clearing your cache helps and you may also delete your browser cookies to ensure you have the up to date version of our website.-H
@MonuKotia Hi Manish, thanks for your tweet. I’ve replied to your DM. Thanks -Cy
@tinytavosa Hi Tavosa, I’ve responded to your DM, please check your inbox. –M
@MonuKotia Alternatively, if you could DM specific information about baggage allowance along with your booking reference, I can check this further and see how I can assist. –M 2/2
@MonuKotia You can call our Contact Centre on +6564999702 or +61396455999. You can also check our website here https://t.co/A0kce0jrjX for other contact numbers. 1/2

@claire_durrant_ Hi Claire, thanks for getting in touch. We normally send out email reminders about our passenger's 
 upcoming flight. I'm sorry if you're unhappy about this. Thanks-Jerry
[SG] FRIDAY HOORAY! SG -> HKT $39, BKK $48, DPS $59, HKG $65, REP $69, TPE $89, OKA $115 one way all-in! Don't miss these awesome fares now on sale at https://t.co/tVF0r3WsnM! https://t.co/lzJMKbIvVJ

@TravelNicklaus We recommend our customers not to post private information (such as booking reference) publicly for confidentiality and security purposes. You may wish to delete this Tweet and provide the booking reference via DM. –M
@pauls_trips Sorry to hear this. Could you please DM your booking reference along with your full name so I can check this further and see how I can assist? –M
RT @MarketingEds: . @99dotco flies high with property-themed @Jetstar_Asia airplane https://t.co/ELLwJiNzAF
@Suzanity8 Hi there. Thanks for the shout out. We look forward to welcome you on-board Jetstar flight soon. Thanks - H
@superxuanny Hi Xuan. I have already responded to your DM. Thanks - H
@Ameliastri84 Hi Amelia, thanks for your tweet. I've replied to your DM. Thanks -Cy
@millieelake Hi Amelia, thanks for the tweet. I'm sorry to hear about the changes we've made to your flight times. So I can take a look at your options, please DM us your booking reference. -Cy

@Tarunba02960211 Hi Tarun, Jetstar’s management team is always open to new ideas. For any company to evolve it is essential for our customers to provide feedback about all parts of our business and we’ll make sure your suggestion is included in our report to senior management. Kind Regards -Kelly

data.text: @AttikaAA I’m sorry to hear this Attika. As we outline in our Conditions of Carriage, when travelling international it is the passenger’s responsibility to bring all valid travel documents to enter the country they’re travelling to. 1/2

@finnyonastick Hi Shafinah. We’d like to clarify that not all meals onboard our flights are Halal-certified. However, you can choose from our wide selections of meals and snacks via this link: https://t.co/BnZ5n3yKl7. Thanks - Sassa

@CanaCarrena We received word from them and can confirm that we don’t have a Jetstar Destination Q&A contest.

data.text: [SG] Return for FREE sale is NOW ON! Penang $57, Hong Kong $78, Ho Chi Minh City $87, Bangkok $91, Manila $112, Taipei $142, Okinawa $182, Melbourne $325 ALL-IN RETURN + many more destinations! Book now at https://t.co/qFrf5hsgpA! https://t.co/TcIy4Tzoya
@finnyonastick Hi Shafinah. All Jetstar hot meals are prepared in halal certified kitchens. To check our latest meal options, please see link here https://t.co/jc2NCJXnTB. Thanks - Josh

@VanashreeS Sorry to hear about this, Vanashree. It may help to know that if you purchase a Starter Fare, you are entitled for 1 main carry on bag and 1 small item with a combined weight of 7kgs. You may check our website here https://t.co/wPBqWkVn6M for more info. Thanks-J
@ZatyXDae Hi there, thanks for getting in touch. All our starter fares include 7kg carry on baggage allowance. Please see here for more information: https://t.co/yU1AhOUOXm Thanks-Jerry

@Scarlettojy 2/2 We highly value all feedback from our customers, so please know that your comments will be included in a report to our Management Team so we can seek to improve our services. Thanks - H

@Scarlettojy 1/2 Hi Scarlett. Sorry to hear that you were disappointed about the service provided by our Telephone Reservations. We do train all staff to be professional and friendly at all times so it’s disappointing if this isn’t the level of service you received.

data.text: @CowyPotter I would like to add that Jetstar Australia’s aircraft are loaded differently to what you see in the video, which prevents incidents like this occurring. I hope this information provides more clarity about the incident. 2/2

@CowyPotter We are aware of the video you mention. The baggage handler you see in the video works for BAGS, which provides baggage services to 90 airlines in Thailand. Airports of Thailand (AOT) has issued a statement to Thai media on this incident. 1/2
@DrMeerrettich Hi David, thanks for getting in touch. So we can take a look at this further, can you please DM us your full name along with your booking reference> Thanks-Jerry

@kanikajaggi7 Hi. We highly value all feedback from our customers, so please know that your comments will be included in a report to our Management Team so we can seek to improve our services. Thanks - H

data.text: @kovairamu Hi Ram. Thanks for your tweet. This is to inform you that don’t need to pay for any airport tax for your flight from Jakarta to Singapore. Thanks. - Ren

@ameliaalee__ Sorry to hear this Nema. I’ve checked this and can confirm that our system is currently working fine. I suggest refreshing your Mobile App. Please make sure you have the latest version. –M

@kanikajaggi7 Hi Kanika, sorry to hear about your luggage. Please be assured that we go to great lengths to take care of each piece of baggage, & to return all your things immediately after you've arrived at your destination. Please send your booking reference number via DM so we can check? -C

data.text: RT @lloydthelostboy: On March 27, @Jetstar_Asia flew its first Clark-Osaka flight. Check out what went on during the inaugural here. ☺️✈️…

@iamjeromeow Hi Jerome. Yes, you can bring 2 to 3 bags as long as the total weight of your checked baggage will not exceed your allowance (20 kg) then your good to go. You may check here: https://t.co/1hmHzQ9ZtY for more information about our baggage policy. Thanks - H
@202miyako Thanks for the tag. The social media team is only able to respond to messages in English. Are you able to repost in English so we can assist? –M
@forwardtheatre Hello there. Could you provide us your booking reference number with your full name and email address via DM so we can check this for you? Thanks - H

@louisleongwy Hi Louis. Sorry to hear that you're having difficulty in logging in to your account. You may reload the page by clicking the refresh button. Clearing your cache helps and you may also delete your browser cookies to ensure you have the most up to date version of our website. - H

@mushsinclair I'm sorry to hear this, Anthony. We try to ensure all flights get away on time but I’m afraid that it’s not always possible due to operational requirements and our strict safety standards. Thanks-Jerry

@JoseSJPR Hi there. I'm a little unsure of your concern.  If you could please provide specific information about what has gone wrong along with your booking reference, full name and email address via DM so I can check this further and see how I can assist? Thanks - H

@armanobeidy Hi Arman. We advise your carry-on baggage allowance on your itinerary and include both size and weight restrictions. If you arrive at the airport and have exceeded these, you will incur additional fees to check the excess in. I'm sorry if you were unaware of this.  Thanks - H
@entangledream Hi Crissa, thanks for contacting us. I'm sorry to hear this. Could you please DM us your booking reference to check this for you? Thanks-Jerry

@AjaxDaniyal Sometimes, it can be hard for us to predict exactly how long the delay will last. I sincerely apologise for any inconvenience or difficulties this meant for you. 

Thanks-R (2/2)

data.text: @AjaxDaniyal please bear in mind that once a flight is delayed, it can be hard for us to predict exactly how long the delay will last. The situation with the aircraft or airport can change unexpectedly and there’s always a huge amount of sorting out to be done behind the scenes. Thanks-J 2/2

@AjaxDaniyal Hi Daniyal, I apologise if you weren’t accurately updated on what was happening with your flight from Ho Chi Minh to Hanoi. I know it doesn’t excuse the lack of service, or make up for the frustration experienced –  1/2

@surwiyanta 2/2 delays can still occur. It may help to know that you may add baggage online by logging in with your booking reference and surname through our Manage Booking portal here: https://t.co/xweA4PnaBr or through our Live Chat team here: https://t.co/I8rbRowHjm Hope this helps! -K

@surwiyanta 1/2 Hi, Arista. Sorry to hear you're having trouble contacting our Telephone Reservations team. We consistently monitor our staff levels at peak periods and are training new staff to cut down waiting times. Unfortunately, although we aim to answer every call promptly,
@Rory_Mck 2/2 I can appreciate how upsetting it is if this doesn't happen. Please accept my apologies. Thanks - Maria

@Rory_Mck 1/2 Hi Rory. Thanks for getting in touch. I'm sorry to hear about the delay to your luggage. Please be assured that we go to great lengths to take care of each piece of luggage, and to return all your belongings to you immediately after you've arrived at your destination.
@Hazmikarim52 Hi Zul, so we can look into this further, are you able to DM us your booking reference? Hope to hear from you soon. Kind Regards -Kelly

@kovairamu Hi Ram,thanks for getting in touch. We already replied to your DM. Please be advise that we don't recommend passengers to post personal details including booking reference number publicly.  Thanks-Jerry
@wmpnoname Hi there, thanks for your response. Some items are prohibited as carry-on baggage. As advised by Maria, you can bring it in your checked baggage instead. Thanks-Jerry

@wmpnoname Hi there. Selfie sticks are not allowed in your carry-on baggage, you can bring it in your checked baggage instead. For more information about our carry-on policy, you can check here: https://t.co/wPBqWkVn6M. Thanks - Maria
@devotedtohs Hi Lutfia. So we could check this on our end, kindly provide your booking reference with your full name via DM and see how we can assist you? Thanks - H

@amitdhoke 2/2 and they've successfully arrested the offender.  We’re also working with our ground handler, BAGS and our local security company to ensure the security of our customers’ property on-board our flights. Hope this clarifies your concern. Kind Regards -Kelly

@amitdhoke 1/2 Hi Amit, Thanks for bringing this to our attention. We’re aware of a video circulating online and we've taken this matter very seriously. Since the day of this incident last year, we've been investigating and working with Airports of Thailand (AOT)
@Hazmikarim52 Hi Zul, bank transfer is not available as mode of payment for flights from Phuket to Jakarta. Please see here https://t.co/nXihZGgeUe for available payment options. –M
@SissiKunovska Thanks for your tweet and sorry to hear about this. Upon arrival in Saigon, please approach one of our staff to check for any alternative flights available to Phu Quoc. Thanks - J

@hynospt I would recommend restarting or reinstalling the app. Alternatively, you may wish to contact our Telephone Reservations team at 131538 or our Live Chat Support here: https://t.co/H2heXuqaRp to make your booking. Thanks! – Ren (2/2)

data.text: @kancilpl 1/2 So sorry to hear this Johnson.
